methods.getTable:
Get the table underlying this listener.

:return: (io.deephaven.engine.table.impl.QueryTable) the underlying table
methods.requestRecompute: Notify the listener that its result must be recomputed.
methods.requestRecomputeMatched:
Notify the something about the filters has changed such that all matched rows of the source table should be
 re-evaluated.
methods.requestRecomputeUnmatched:
Notify the something about the filters has changed such that all unmatched rows of the source table should be
 re-evaluated.
methods.setIsRefreshing:
Set the filter and the table refreshing or not.

:param refreshing: boolean

text: Users of WhereFilter may implement this interface if they must react to the filter fundamentally changing.
